code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function NotificationForm(){const[recipient,setRecipient]=useState("");const[message,setMessage]=useState("");const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();fetch("http://localhost:8002/notify/",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({recipient,message})});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Send Notification"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Recipient",value:recipient,onChange:e=>setRecipient(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Message",value:message,onChange:e=>setMessage(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Send"})]})]});}export default NotificationForm;
